divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and kids and I were at a Festival in Matthews NC and while my daughter was playing on the gym set she asked me to snap a picture. I took the photo with our digital samsung camera and as soon as I looked at the screen I saw the object and immediately looked in the sky to see what was there. There was not one single cloud in the sky and the object is directly in the path of all flights that land at Charlotte Douglas Int. Airport. I showed my daughter and my wife and they didn't see any clouds.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Matthews
There were no other sightings in Matthews on or around August 31st 2012
